website_summaries.verdict: This is a great choice for those looking for an overall solid and attractive fan without having to spend a lot of money.
pros: The fan looks good, particularly the brushed nickel finish
You have a choice between light and dark sides with the fan blades
cons: Some buyers report problems with noise, particularly an annoying ticking sound
This option seems a little cheap compared to other fans

customer_reviews.title: Unauthorized Seller
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a Home Depot exclusive product. This seller is not authorized to sell this fan. After installation the light on the fan we purchased did not work. So we called the number on the instruction manual. It is a Home Depot service number. Due to the fact that we unknowingly purchased this item from an unauthorized seller, it voided any parts warranties. Therefore we had to pay for the part needed to fix the fan. Upon receiving the part, and installing, the fan light still did not work. This purchase was a waste of money. We threw away the box, so could not return it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Avr1979

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces/broken globe
customer_reviews.text: ***update Contacted the company and received replacements for the broken and missing pieces within two days. Customer service was wonderful and now the fans are great additions to our decor. Bought 2 of these fans for the guest bedrooms in our house. When opening the box the assemble the second fan, I was dismayed to find the globe cracked and the fan pulls missing. My guess is that this fan was returned by another customer and a quality check was not performed. Not happy. My advice would be to check that all parts are accounted for before beginning installation.
customer_reviews.author: Gregsgurl

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive fan/light with good air flow.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well built and attractive this fan was - with no wobble at all. Was initially concerned that due to it's seeming close proximity to the ceiling that the air flow would be low, but that was not the case - it was able to cool the entire living room (sized 32 x 16 ft).
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: This is not a "Hampton Bay" Fan
customer_reviews.text: We just received our fan today and there is nothing indicating that this is a "Hampton Bay" fan. False advertising! The box says nothing, the product itself does not have their logo on it or on the assembly instructions (Home Depot). We hope this fan functions as well as our other Hampton Fans do in our house. If not, we are returning it. Keep you posted....
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Quality commensurate with price.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on the box, nothing on the fan, and nothing in the installation and warranty paperwork indicates this is a Hampton Bay fan. Every other Hampton Bay fan I have ever owned or installed had a Hampton Bay medallion on the fan and usually on the fan and light pulls. Not this one. Quality of construction not as good as I am used to with Hampton Bay. On highest speed, fan rotation slow compared to Hampton Bay fans I was replacing. Installation was straight forward, though getting the light-kit on is tricky because the housing above the light-kit where all the wires are is a bit small. Fan runs quiet. Good choice for low ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The price of this fan was amazing! I was worried when I got it, that it would be cheap and awful but I was surprised! It was very well built and sturdy. It's a $200 fan for half of that! I installed this in our bedroom and it was really easy to put together and to wire. The fan runs very quiet and looks great! I wanted the blades white so I painted them and it worked out very well and made it match the room. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aumray

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Looks great. Light output is a little less than I would like, but it is in a big room. The shade is pretty flat, and there is one bulb, so most of the light is down. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: A great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these ceiling fans. I’ve had them now for a little over a year. Work well and I love that they have standard light bulb size.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great styling!
customer_reviews.text: These fans look very nice, great styling and perform well. I don't think they are available any more. I bought 6 through Home Depot and tried to get more, but they are not available. Probably because at this price they wouldn't be selling any fans at a higher price. Found additional ones thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MJ in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend buying this fan. I have put several fans together, so as far as putting it together wasn't really an issue. However, after installing it, we found that it is extremely loud. The motor has a constant "click click click" to it and it sounds like it is running on a dry bearing. It is a cheap fan and you can definitely tell it is made up of cheap parts.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful five bladed. l fan at a great value. fast shipping. I would definitely recommend it to fan shoppers
customer_reviews.author: George Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan, puts off good airflow. I put these in the bedrooms, and the rooms are 11x10, 11x13, and 12x10. There can accommodate a larger room. Had the smaller ones in the bedrooms, however the airflow was minimal, this is why I went with larger.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install a lil noisy not bad for $40. 😭😭😭😭😭😂😂😂😂😂😂 Noisy ass hell don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: maurice foulkes

customer_reviews.title: Toooooooo dim
customer_reviews.text: Very dim light We had nice ceiling fans but wanted to replace them with something brighter Ordered these and they are worse than what we originally had Too much work to take them down and return them
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, both make the ugliest rattle when they are on any higher than the lowest setting. Had them professionally installed. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A little scratched up but works well
customer_reviews.text: These have worked well but they came in scratched up, all three of them I bought were the same way. Although you can't really tell from the ground I could when installing. Made me concerned about the overall quality. They've been working for about a year now and I haven't had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design....
customer_reviews.text: Have this fan installed for 8 months now and I have realise a couple things. After the installation the fan spins fines for about 2 months then it start to wobble which makes a metal click that is very annoying. I guess thats the quality I paid for all in all circulates hair very nicely in a 20 x 10 room.
customer_reviews.author: Kofi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet air mover
customer_reviews.text: purchased 2 of these for my new place, bedroom and living room, its nice, quiet, and peaceful. Easy to install, good air movement. I purchased one of these a few years ago, so had no doubt about getting more for the new place, I have not had any issues with the old one (which is still working flawlessly), and don't expect any issues from the new ones, good quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ceiling Fans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three beautiful ceiling fans. My contractor put them together, I watched and it was easy. Once my contractor installed all three ceiling fans, I said wow look how beautiful they look and my contractor agreed, by the way my contractor is a friend of the family so it was free of charge. I highly recommend these beautiful fans.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Rosario

customer_reviews.title: A really cheap fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is cheap -- it does work but it has a very lightweight motor that I'm not sure is going to last through heavy use. It's in the living room of my rental property, so I expect to get 2 years out of it -- I'll be happy if it lasts longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Don't really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a cheaper version of a real ceiling fan. After putting it up it makes a squealing noise when the fan is running which is very annoying. So it is basically now just a light. Would not buy a Hampton Bay ceiling fan again.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff from Good Folks
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to install, classy looking, great price, extremely cooperative supplier and between myself and my girl friend we've bought 4 that I've installed and they are all great. Had one problem with one unit that the supplier remedied in a blink. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence V. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Has bad electrical noise...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this fan. It has an electrical hum in it that will drive you nuts. No good. Makes noise. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Much cheaper than bricks and mortar locations
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Much cheaper than bricks and mortar locations. So glad we ordered these. They have a light and dark side so you can pick your slat color. Looks really nice in our largish rooms. We will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it was easy to install. I purchased this fan as the fan we had in master bedroom went out. I was able to even fit my old blades on this fan and worked perfect. I read reviews that this is a refurbished fan but I can confirm mine was brand new. I had checked out other fans at HD and Lowes but they were more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: El Chapo

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Light fixture is not bright enough. Fan gives off a ticking sound. I’ve taken it down and remounted it 3 times but the ticking sound persists. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Don Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Dude this fan doesn't require yelling at your wife to ...
customer_reviews.text: Dude this fan doesn't require yelling at your wife to install! Normally I need her to hold it so I can attach the wires but this one has a hook that holds the fan motor in place the whole time! No more family fights over fan installs! I bought 3 Update: I have 5 of these now. GREAT fans GREAT price
customer_reviews.author: David Crosby

customer_reviews.title: noise lever to high
customer_reviews.text: it works fine but to noisy for me the other fans I have are noise free I would not buy this if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Looks very modern
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed it in one short afternoon. It runs quietly and looks very modern. Our old one had been up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks great and the light is better than most. Unfortunately, the fan does make noise on all speeds. I would've returned it, but there's a restocking fee, so, because the price was low, I'll just keep it. Buyer beware, I would look elsewhere for a fan. I ended buying 2 more (different brand / model ) at Homedepot, and although I paid a bit more, it was worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It works great and you can control the speed
customer_reviews.text: This was inexpensive and yet it exceeded my expectations. It works great and you can control the speed.
customer_reviews.author: L K Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Easie to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, love the light. The pull chain arrangement is a little hokey but besides that! Comes with a light bulb that is dim so you'll need to upgrade that.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I've installed lots of fans. This one is about the same as every other one. It does lack in some quality aspects. But for my kids room it does the job. Especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: 'standard

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan. shipping was quick
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. shipping was quick. Looks nice.....The motor is a little loud, especially at night when trying to sleep. Easy assembly. it was up in under 30 minutes from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: jimww4963

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Much needed for 2nd bedroom, beautifully built and looks perfect in the room
customer_reviews.author: KeithP

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, easy to install, cheap. Only problem is it doesn't seem to move the air as much as I would think. It might have somethign to do with how close to the ceiling it is mounted.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Glass bowl that covers the light is defective its bent melted looks like factory defective
customer_reviews.author: T.O.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these fans and they have very strong noise levels. Very annoying sound like something is grinding.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Makes a loud ticking sound like others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Makes a loud ticking sound like others have mentioned. I bought two and installed one. Going to return the other one.
customer_reviews.author: abli

customer_reviews.title: That there was understanding by all parties
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely hope to feel so great next spring I will buy that lovely kayak and have all summer to enjoy it, but at 86 you never know. Thanks for understanding
customer_reviews.author: Bromley D.

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Cost of installation out weighed the value of the fan which is absolutely stunning and perfect for the room.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, pictures don’t do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! We remodeled our children’s rooms to a more adult style because they are now teenagers and we thought the fans looked great for the price online but when we got them and my husband installed them they really beat my expectations! Will be purchasing another 2 for the last 2 bedrooms!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: it hangs from the ceiling and spins...
customer_reviews.text: The light is not enough to illuminate a 10x15 foot room. Very dim, even with a brighter bulb there is only 1 bulb. other than that the fan is quiet and its a nice looking fan.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dickbuckles

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooling larger room, doesn't take up a lot of vertical space.
customer_reviews.text: I had my electrician install this fan, so I can't comment on assembly, nor installation, but the fan looks nice, operates as expected, and isn't too noisy. Mine is installed in a large basement bedroom, so I needed the longer fan blades, but it couldn't take up a lot of space vertically. This is perfect. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, and the light is a joke. A nightlight will put out more light that this. I installed on is my son’s room and I can’t use the fan. I’ve taken it down a checked it multiple times and it will not stop making noise. I’ve installed many ceiling fans, and this one is by far the worst!
customer_reviews.author: Justin McClure

customer_reviews.title: GREAT light GREAT fan!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fan and light in my boys room. Quick/no hassle shipping. Came as advertised. My hubby had it installed without an issues!! LOVE the brightness of the light, the silver is nice and the blades are reversible for different looks. Would recommend, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: So cheap. You can hear the metal pull chains ...
customer_reviews.text: So cheap. You can hear the metal pull chains rattling against metal body. Mine was defective, after about a month or two, SPARKS shot out of it when I turned the fan on. I keep tape over the light switch so nobody turns it on now (until I replace the fan). The light still works. BUT the light is extremely dim.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Hugs the 8 foot ceiling and the 6 footers in the house don't bang their heads on it. It's quiet and moves a lot of air. Looks as well as any ceiling fan does. They are all ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Fan came broken!
customer_reviews.text: Fan came broken...very disappointed. It won't turn the light off...so I just leave it on. Waited along time to get it installed by an electrician.😢
customer_reviews.author: Susan Creamer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just put it up a few days ago and I am so happy I went with this fan! It really helps circulate the air and isn't too noisy, just a couple of quiet creaks here and there (but pretty much every fan does that). Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Chains are a little hard to pull and catch on each ball of the chain.

customer_reviews.title: best deal!
customer_reviews.text: super nice fan for an amazing deal! Very impressed with this purchase! I haven't put the covering on yet but its beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: not a great fan. need to be careful with the wiring ...
customer_reviews.text: it's ok.. not a great fan. need to be careful with the wiring -- make sure to stuff all connections back into the ceiling because the fan's house spins right underneath where the connections are made.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It runs quiet and is effective. The installation was not too difficult, only attaching the light group had to be done before the blades could be installed and that was the hardest part.

customer_reviews.title: Not Hampton bay.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a no name box. Other then that it's great easy to install and its quite

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, Love the brushed nickel!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Ordered it to renovate an appartment we were working on flipping, The brushed nickel finish is a beautiful touch. Size specifications are correct. I like Hampton Bay products in general, and this one leaves nothing to be desired. Good size to fit in a small room. We used it in the master bedroom of a 2 bedroom apartment, about 900 square foot.

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful and is very quiet. Very easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been working and looking great. And always, I love Amazon prime, customer service, price & fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: The fan is not Hampton bay and the light casing ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan is not Hampton bay and the light casing is all plastic. However it does work as a fan but you can get it cheaper at home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this today, 20 minutes went up no problems. Nice quality blades didn't need balancing and hugs the ceiling. Much quieter than the fan it replaced.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for the price! Runs quiet and moves a good amount of air. My only wish is that it could be set to run off a light switch and. It just the pull chains. Still very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan for the price, but not very easy to install if you are installing one for the first time.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fans! Good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice fans! Good price! They don’t come with two of the necessary screws to mount it, so make sure you plan on a trip to the hardware store.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit noisey. Original seller asked to cancel order due to issues with obtaining production. Then had one pallet of product and my order was last items on pallet and were heavily damaged. Can el order found same fans next day priced 10 dollars more.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: This fan is mostly Ok. It does not rotate ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is mostly Ok. It does not rotate as fast as I thought it would when it is on high.

customer_reviews.title: Saves money
customer_reviews.text: I don't need my air conditioner as much with this product. Therefore, it is more energy efficient and effective.

customer_reviews.title: Home Depot fan
customer_reviews.text: the fan looks really good on my ceiling. Only problem is fan speed on high is not as fast as I would like. Also, the speed adjustment chain is a bit rough when you pull on it. It scrapes the sides abit. Otherwise it seems to be a nice little fan.

customer_reviews.title: still need to install a fan approved box but we've unpacked it and it's beautiful. Can't believe it was so cheap

customer_reviews.text: My Son just finished installing this fan stated it is one of the nicest for the price. Thanks for fast ship, am very pleased

customer_reviews.text: Quiet, hugger fan. Brushed nickel looks nice and the clean light fixture is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice fan, but you have to pull really hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan, but you have to pull really hard on the cords and it makes noise when you pull on the cord. I would have preferred more light, but it does put out a lot of air which is nice in the desert.

customer_reviews.title: Bedroom fan
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while it makes noise, but not always. Don't know why, but for the price, it's worth it.

customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works, but the motor makes a noise that sounds like a duck quacking. It's maddening. Too much work to take it apart and send it back. My friends will just have to deal with it.

customer_reviews.text: The fans looks beautiful and work great! They are quiet and make the room look nice!

customer_reviews.text: After a little less than a year, the motor has become loud. We don’t use it anymore.

product_meta.title: Hampton Bay FBA_AL383-BN AL383-BN
product_meta.description: The Hampton Bay 52 in. Hugger Ceiling Fan installs as a flush-mount for rooms where ceiling height is limited. Reversible blades have a maple finish on one side and walnut on the other, letting you choose a light or dark color to match your style preference. Offering three speeds with 4670 CFM maximum airflow, this fan is ideal for most interior rooms up to 20 ft. x 20 ft. Multi-capacitor for quiet operation and maximum air movement. Flush-mount installation for low ceilings. Uses a medium-base bulb (not included). California residents: see Proposition 65 information.
feature_bullets: Reversible blades with walnut finish on one side and maple finish on the other Brushed nickel finish complements many interior accents
Integrated frosted opal schoolhouse light fixture Wall control
Multi-capacitor for quiet operation and maximum air movement Designed for interior use
Flush mount installation for low ceilings For most interior rooms up to 20 ft. x 20 ft.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars554 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
